text: eyaṭa ohu “ō nūh! niyata vaśayenma ohu obagē pavulē keneku nova; niyata vaśayenma ohu napuru kriyāvanma karamin siṭiyēya. (napuru kriyāvehi yedennā obagē pavulē keneku nova). ebævin oba nodannā kāraṇāvan gæna mā veta (tarka kara), novimasanu. nodænuvat ayagen keneku bavaṭa obat pat novanu yayi mā niyata vaśayenma obaṭa hon̆da ovadan dennemi”yayi pavæsuvēya
